verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to Ariel <WH740>, to Ariel <WH740>, the city <WH7151> where David <WH1732> dwelt <WH2583> <WH8804> ! add <WH5595> <WH8798> ye year <WH8141> to year <WH8141>; let them kill <WH5362> <WH8799> sacrifices <WH2282>.
Yet I will distress <WH6693> <WH8689> Ariel <WH740>, and there shall be heaviness <WH8386> and sorrow <WH592>: and it shall be unto me as Ariel <WH740>.

And I will camp <WH2583> <WH8804> against thee round about <WH1754>, and will lay siege <WH6696> <WH8804> against thee with a mount <WH4674>, and I will raise <WH6965> <WH8689> forts <WH4694> against thee.

And thou shalt be brought down <WH8213> <WH8804>, and shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> out of the ground <WH776>, and thy speech <WH565> shall be low <WH7817> <WH8735> out of the dust <WH6083>, and thy voice <WH6963> shall be, as of one that hath a familiar spirit <WH178>, out of the ground <WH776>, and thy speech <WH565> shall whisper <WH6850> <WH8770> out of the dust <WH6083>.

Moreover the multitude <WH1995> of thy strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> shall be like small <WH1851> dust <WH80>, and the multitude <WH1995> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be as chaff <WH4671> that passeht away <WH5674> <WH8802>: yea, it shall be at an instant <WH6621> suddenly <WH6597>.

Thou shalt be visited <WH6485> <WH8735> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> with thunder <WH7482>, and with earthquake <WH7494>, and great <WH1419> noise <WH6963>, with storm <WH5492> and tempest <WH5591>, and the flame <WH3851> of devouring <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784>.

And the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> that fight <WH6633> <WH8802> against Ariel <WH740>, even all that fight <WH6638> <WH8802> against her and her munition <WH4685>, and that distress <WH6693> <WH8688> her, shall be as a dream <WH2472> of a night <WH3915> vision <WH2377>.

It shall even be as when an hungry <WH7457> man dreameth <WH2492> <WH8799>, and, behold, he eateth <WH398> <WH8802>; but he awaketh <WH6974> <WH8689>, and his soul <WH5315> is empty <WH7386>: or as when <WH834> a thirsty man <WH6771> dreameth <WH2492> <WH8799>, and, behold, he drinketh <WH8354> <WH8802>; but he awaketh <WH6974> <WH8689>, and, behold, he is faint <WH5889>, and his soul <WH5315> hath appetite <WH8264> <WH8802>: so shall the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> be, that fight <WH6633> <WH8802> against mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>.

Stay <WH4102> <WH8697> yourselves, and wonder <WH8539> <WH8798>; cry ye out <WH8173> <WH8697>, and cry <WH8173> <WH8798>: they are drunken <WH7937> <WH8804>, but not with wine <WH3196>; they stagger <WH5128> <WH8804>, but not with strong drink <WH7941>.

For the YY <WH3068> hath poured out <WH5258> <WH8804> upon you the spirit <WH7307> of deep sleep <WH8639>, and hath closed <WH6105> <WH8762> your eyes <WH5869>: the prophets <WH5030> and your rulers <WH7218>, the seers <WH2374> hath he covered <WH3680> <WH8765>.

And the vision <WH2380> of all is become unto you as the words <WH1697> of a book <WH5612> that is sealed <WH2856> <WH8803>, which men deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> to one that is learned <WH3045> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Read <WH7121> <WH8798> this, I pray thee: and he saith <WH559> <WH8804>, I cannot <WH3201> <WH8799>; for it is sealed <WH2856> <WH8803>:

And the book <WH5612> is delivered <WH5414> <WH8738> to him that is not learned <WH3045> <WH8804> <WH5612>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Read <WH7121> <WH8798> this, I pray thee: and he saith <WH559> <WH8804>, I am not learned <WH3045> <WH8804>.

Wherefore the YY <WH136> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> draw near <WH5066> <WH8738> me with their mouth <WH6310>, and with their lips <WH8193> do honour <WH3513> <WH8765> me, but have removed <WH7368> their heart <WH3820> far <WH7368> <WH8765> from me, and their fear <WH3374> toward me is taught <WH3925> <WH8794> by the precept <WH4687> of men <WH582>:

Therefore, behold, I will proceed <WH3254> <WH8802> to do a marvellous work <WH6381> <WH8687> among this people <WH5971>, even a marvellous work <WH6381> <WH8687> and a wonder <WH6382>: for the wisdom <WH2451> of their wise <WH2450> men shall perish <WH6> <WH8804>, and the understanding <WH998> of their prudent <WH995> <WH8737> men shall be hid <WH5641> <WH8691>.

Woe <WH1945> unto them that seek deep <WH6009> <WH8688> to hide <WH5641> <WH8687> their counsel <WH6098> from the YY <WH3068>, and their works <WH4639> are in the dark <WH4285>, and they say <WH559> <WH8799>, Who seeth <WH7200> <WH8802> us? and who knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> us?

Surely your turning of things upside down <WH2017> <WH8800> shall be esteemed <WH2803> <WH8735> as the potter's <WH3335> <WH8802> clay <WH2563>: for shall the work <WH4639> say <WH559> <WH8799> of him that made <WH6213> <WH8802> it, He made <WH6213> <WH8804> me not? or shall the thing framed <WH3336> say <WH559> <WH8804> of him that framed <WH3335> <WH8802> it, He had no understanding <WH995> <WH8689> ?

Is it not yet a very <WH4213> little while <WH4592>, and Lebanon <WH3844> shall be turned <WH7725> <WH8804> into a fruitful field <WH3759>, and the fruitful field <WH3759> shall be esteemed <WH2803> <WH8735> as a forest <WH3293> ?

And in that day <WH3117> shall the deaf <WH2795> hear <WH8085> <WH8804> the words <WH1697> of the book <WH5612>, and the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> out of obscurity <WH652>, and out of darkness <WH2822>.

The meek <WH6035> also shall increase <WH3254> <WH8804> their joy <WH8057> in the YY <WH3068>, and the poor <WH34> among men <WH120> shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> in HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For the terrible one <WH6184> is brought to nought <WH656> <WH8804>, and the scorner <WH3887> <WH8801> is consumed <WH3615> <WH8804>, and all that watch <WH8245> <WH8802> for iniquity <WH205> are cut off <WH3772> <WH8738>:

That make a man <WH120> an offender <WH2398> <WH8688> for a word <WH1697>, and lay a snare <WH6983> <WH8799> for him that reproveth <WH3198> <WH8688> in the gate <WH8179>, and turn aside <WH5186> <WH8686> the just <WH6662> for a thing of nought <WH8414>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, who redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804> Avraham <WH85>, concerning the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, Ya`akov <WH3290> shall not now be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, neither shall his face <WH6440> now wax pale <WH2357> <WH8799>.

But when he seeth <WH7200> <WH8800> his children <WH3206>, the work <WH4639> of mine hands <WH3027>, in the midst <WH7130> of him, they shall sanctify <WH6942> <WH8686> my name <WH8034>, and sanctify <WH6942> <WH8689> HaKadosh <WH6918> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and shall fear <WH6206> <WH8686> the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

They also that erred <WH8582> <WH8802> in spirit <WH7307> shall come <WH3045> <WH8804> to understanding <WH998>, and they that murmured <WH7279> <WH8803> shall learn <WH3925> <WH8799> doctrine <WH3948>.
